name: Exlinks
tagline: A userscript to make E-Hentai & ExHentai links on 4chan & Foolz archive more useful.
body:
[CLICK HERE TO INSTALL EXLINKS](https://github.com/Hupotronic/ExLinks/raw/stable/ExLinks.user.js)

ExLinks is a userscript created for Chrome and Firefox that makes browsing Sad Panda threads a much nicer experience. Instead of having a list of plain links to open one at a time, ExLinks will save you a ton of time by turning the links into something useful. Let this picture act as a demonstration:


![Example](http://i.imgbox.com/abhzY8VS.png)

## IMPORTANT

Make sure you remove any pre-2.0.0 versions (1.7.4 or older) of ExLinks from your userscripts before installing ExLinks from here!

## Installation (Chrome)
1. Make sure you have [Tampermonkey](http://tampermonkey.net/).
2. Install the userscript by clicking the big install link above.

## Installation (Firefox)
1. Make sure you have [Greasemonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/).
2. Install the userscript by clicking the big install link above.

## Troubleshooting
If something seems to be failing, **make sure all of your software is up to date.** Guaranteed minimums are Chrome 21 and Firefox 14, but you really should be always running the latest stable versions if possible.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
